CustomField.formula: LEFT(IF(INCLUDES( Media_Type__c , "Radio"), "Radio" +", ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Media_Type__c , "Television"), "Television"+ ", ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Media_Type__c , "Print"), "Print" +", " , NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Media_Type__c , "Social Media"), "Social Media" +", ",NULL ),(LEN(IF(INCLUDES( Media_Type__c , "Radio"), "Radio" +", ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Media_Type__c , "Television"), "Television"+ ", ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Media_Type__c , "Print"), "Print" +", " , NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Media_Type__c , "Social Media"), "Social Media" +", ",NULL )) - 2) )
CustomField.label: fMediaType
